about.title: Web Developer
about.name: I'm Alejandro Toledo
about.description: Fullstack developer and Systems Engineering student. My focus covers both frontend and backend development, using technologies such as React, Node.js and Next.js.

projects.1: ChatApp is a real-time messaging application that allows all registered users in the system to have instant conversations with each other.
projects.2: Teslo Shop is a clone of the Tesla website, where users can perform all available actions in an e-commerce.
projects.3: NewsApp is a web page that allows users to search for news on desired topics, allowing the user to filter information by language.
projects.4: CalendarApp allows the user to create reminders or events to be completed over time.
projects.5: Pipos y Melosos is a website for the Pipos y Melosos store, where products are showcased, and users can modify, add, and delete them.
projects.6: JournalApp is a web platform for creating notes easily and accessibly in one place. Compatible with multiple devices, allowing easy access from anywhere.
projects.7: GiftExpertApp allows users to search for gifs based on the entered parameter in the search bar.
projects.8: EduvetQuiz is a website for veterinary students, featuring quizzes on various topics and options to select the quiz to take.
projects.9: Ecommerce fake is an e-commerce that consumes API for obtaining information. The administrator can insert, delete, and update product information (CRUD).
